content.raw:
Suggestion: it may be worth documenting that `SaveModel` will return false if the model doens't have a `model.config` file.

Also note that returning false in the blocks below does not remove the model files from the cache directory, is that the intention? If downloading a model without a config file should still work, maybe we could consider changing the error messages to warnings and returning true anyway.
content.html:
Suggestion: it may be worth documenting that SaveModel will return false if the model doens't have a model.config file.

Also note that returning false in the blocks below does not remove the model files from the cache directory, is that the intention? If downloading a model without a config file should still work, maybe we could consider changing the error messages to warnings and returning true anyway.
